proposal: Diving into the AI revolution with LinkTensor's decentralized network is like giving the power of intelligence to everyone's hands, not just the tech giants. With 290 holders in the ETH network already trusting this vision, why not amplify your reach? Our DEX and Lottery tools could be the perfect pair to engage your community further, letting anyone deploy and share in the success. Let's democratize not just AI, but also the benefits it brings.
